member.name: M:Terrasoft.Nui.ServiceModel.AspNetCore.Controllers.ConfigurationStatusController.GetConfigurationStatusReport
member.summary: Endpoint for obtaining the configuration status report

returns.para: Returns a 200 OK status if request processed correctly..
Returns a 403 Forbidden if user doesn't have admin rights.
Returns a 403 Forbidden if current functionality is disabled.

member.summary: Endpoint for obtaining last compilation result.

returns.para: Returns a 200 OK status if request processed correctly.

Returns a 403 Forbidden if current functionality is disabled.
